articles.title: WhatsApp messaging service slowly returns after suffering global outage - ABC News
articles.description: Popular messaging app WhatsApp stops working for many users across the world, with people in Australia, India, the United Kingdom, South Africa and Asia reporting issues.
articles.content:
Popular messaging app WhatsApp is gradually coming back online, with some users in India, Asia and the United Kingdom saying they were able to send and receive some messages and videos again.
